p:
B6: Synthesis of ( E)-3-(thiophen-2″-yl)-1-[4′-(trifluoromethoxy)phenyl]prop-2-en-1-one: Yield: 76%; m.p. 82 °C; R
f = 0.68 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1656 (C=O), 1512 (CH=CH), 1610 (Ar C=C), 3126 (Ar C-H stretching), 1262 (-CF 3), 1156 (-C-O-), 620 (C-S); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm): δ: ), 7.05 (1H, d, J = 16, -CO-CH=), 8.05 (1H, d, J = 6.2, 4.9 Ar-CH=), 7.20–8.02 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.17–7.79 (3H, m, C-3″, 4″, 5″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 299.16 [M + H] +.
